summary: Three men and a woman crash-land in a deep crater in Antarctica, where they find a prehistoric world.
cast: Jock Mahoney|Shirley Patterson|William Reynolds|Henry Brandon|Douglas Kennedy|Phil Harvey|Ralph Brooks|George Calliga|Tom Coleman|Kenner G. Kemp|Bing Russell|Bert Stevens
keywords: carnivorous plant|damsel in distress|newspaper reporter|strange anomaly|bartering for lone female
director: Director: Virgil W. Vogel (as Virgil Vogel)
title: Tierra desconocida
